Package ohos.aafwk.ability.continuation

Provides interfaces and classes for interacting with the Device+ control center for ability migration.

You can register the ability to be migrated with the Device+ control center, manage devices that support ability migration through the Device+ control center, provide a list of candidate devices for the user, and start ability migration based on the selected device information.

Since:
5
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IContinuationDeviceCallback
    Provides callbacks for listening for device connection state changes.
    IContinuationRegisterManager
    Provides methods for interacting with the Device+ control center, including methods for registering and unregistering the ability to migrate, updating the device connection state, and showing the list of devices that can be selected for ability migration.
    RequestCallback
    Provides a callback for listening for connection state changes of the Device+ control center.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExtraParams
    Defines the extra parameters used to sort out the list of available devices.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DeviceConnectState
    Enumerates the connection states of a device in the Device+ control center.
